description: the game is missing the bonuschars.kart file meaning you can't play on most servers as you can't just download it in game.

For some reason, building from the repos won't give me Discord Rich Presence access, but this and the vanilla SRB2K do. So I'm at a loss what to do about all this. Yes the game works, yes it has discord support, yes it seems to work with the latest version of HEP, even if it's outdated.
